answers.answer: A fasting glucose of 111 mg/dl means you are prediabetic and soon to be diabetic unless you make lifestyle changes. See my reply to jaydee1977 for suggestions.

Research and start taking Alpha Lipoic Acid/diabetes and banaba leaf/diabetes.  If you are overweight have you had your thyroid checked?  If you lack nutrition, your body will crave foods.  Also, the American diet is very acidic.  Get some pH test strips and check.  The body being in an acidic state can cause all kinds of diseases.

question: I am 53, female, very overweight, my labs came back with the following;Fasting Glucose:  111Cholesterol:           122Triglyceride:            213HDL:                            56LDL:                            23Very Low Lipoprotein:  43Does this mean I am a diabetic?  does this effect heart disease?  I have moderate aortic stenosis and some other health issues.Thank you for your help
title: Cholesterol & Diabetese
